item.title: Deep Learning Tutorials
item.description: —- THESE POSTS ARE BROKEN — PLEASE EXCUSE WHILE I FIX THEM Welcome to my Deep Learning Tutorial Series! Here are the posts in order so you can find them all from the same landing page: [Introduction to Deep Learning][week-1]: A bird’s eye of what deep learning is why it’s become so popular these days Logistic Regression and Neural Networks: An exploration of the idea behind Neural Networks (actually, just one neuron for this part) using a Logistic Regression, a a popular Machine Learning Algorithm.
